ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Product_Name__c ) ) , OR( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Jewelry_Type__c ) ) ) ,NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Type__c ) ) ),NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Collection_Name__c ) ) ),NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Enquiry_Value__c ) ) ),NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Style__c ) ) ),NOT( ISBLANK( Design_Number__c ) ),NOT( ISBLANK( Product_Description__c ) )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Do not Fill the Product Information as Product is selected
